settings.imgsubheading: Sign up for the program through the link below
Share your custom link and earn $50 for each person that purchases through your link!
Payments will be sent directly to your PayPal account every 2 weeks!

settings.subheading: Join our referral program and earn commission directly to your PayPal Account for every person you refer to our business that makes a purchase!

settings.heading: Program Overview
settings.content:
Simply refer as many friends, family members, or other businesses through your Special Referral Link and once they place their order you’ll earn $50 Cash Via PayPal right in your PayPal Account. 

They will receive our Special Introductory Sale Pricing making it a win-win for both you and them as they will get an incredible deal.

Super Simple!

settings.heading: Access Your Referral Dashboard
settings.content:
Your affiliate dashboard is a where you can login, and see exactly how many people have clicked on your special referral link, and how many sales you have generated...

It also will show the status of each payment you've received for past sales.

You can view your dashboard here...

settings.heading: Top Way's to Earn Referring Custom Products
settings.content:
To make things even easier for you to start earning commissions...

We've put together a list easy to use templates to copy and past through social media / email / SMS you'll find below...

settings.heading:
TEMPLATE #
1Social Media Post (Facebook / Instagram / Etc...)
settings.content:
How to Use: If your feeling lazy and don't know what to type, simply copy and paste the text below and post it on your favorite social media platform.

Message to Post: "I Love My New Custom Tumblers from Kodiak and couldn't be happier with how my order turned out! Snag your own up here and save $60 on your first order!"

Image to Post: Take a photo of your order and post it when sending...

OR

Use our premade photo below and simply copy and paste it to your wall instead.

settings.heading:
TEMPLATE #2
Email Friends, Family & Businesses
settings.content:
How to Use: One of the best ways to reach other businesses you've worked with is by email. Think of any of your past customers or vendors that might be a good fit for custom drinkware and shoot them over an email! Same goes for friends and family! 

Message to Email: 
"Hey FIRSTNAME, 

Hope all is good.

I recently got some custom tumblers made for our business from the company Kodiak Coolers and they turned out incredible. Everyone's loving them.

Thought you guys might benefit from some of these for your business too.

I'm part of their referral program now so if you do want to check them out, use the link below so that way I'll earn a few bucks and you will also get access to a special sale they run for first time customers.

>>YOUR AFFILIATE LINK GOES HERE<<

I've attached a photo of the ones they did for us.

Take Care!"

Image to Post: Take a photo of your order and post it when sending...

OR

Use our premade photo above and simply copy and paste it to your wall instead.

settings.heading:
TEMPLATE #3
SMS Friends, Family & Businesses
settings.content:
How to Use: Again, SMS works wonders cause 95% of people see them right away in todays age. Shoot any friends, family, or relationships you have with other businesses a quick text message.

Message to SMS: 
"FIRSTNAME Hope all is good. 

Check out these awesome tumblers we had made for our business, they turned out

Thought you guys might wanna get some made for your business.awesome. 

If you want to check them out heres a link to their website: >>YOUR AFFILIATE LINK GOES HERE<<

You should get access to a special sale they run for first time customers through that link

I've attached a photo of the ones they did for us.

Cheers!"

Image to Post: Take a photo of your order and post it when sending...

OR

Use our premade photo above and simply copy and paste it to your wall instead.
